title: Small freshwater fish in a tank 1

content.question: On the axes provided, construct the appropriate type of labeled graph showing the relationship between water temperature and fish distribution. Summarize the outcome of the experiment.

frqParts.text: On the axes provided, construct the appropriate type of labeled graph showing the relationship between water temperature and fish distribution. Summarize the outcome of the experiment.

skill.text: 4.A: Construct a graph to represent the data, including: x-y graphs (bar, histogram, line, log scale, dual y), scatter plot, box and whisker plot, and pie chart. The graph should include the following components: i. type of graph appropriate for the data ii. axis labeling, including appropriate units and legend iii. scaling iv. accurately plotted data (including error bars when appropriate) v. trend line (when appropriate)
